mapper.insert: insert into t_bill(bill_time, bill_price, bill_remark, user_id, category_id) VALUES (#{billTime}, #{billPrice}, #{billRemark}, #{userId}, #{categoryId})
mapper.update:
update t_bill
bill_price=#{billPrice},
bill_remark=#{billRemark},
bill_time=#{billTime},
where user_id=#{userId} and bill_id=#{billId}
mapper.select: select bill_id, bill_time, bill_price, bill_remark, a.user_id as user_id, a.category_id as category_id, category_type, category_name, user_gender, user_name, user_password, user_real_name from t_bill a inner join t_category tc on a.category_id = tc.category_id inner join t_user tu on a.user_id = tu.user_id where a.user_id = #{userId} order by bill_time desc

select bill_id, bill_time, bill_price, bill_remark, a.user_id as user_id, a.category_id as category_id, category_type, category_name, user_gender, user_name, user_password, user_real_name from t_bill a inner join t_category tc on a.category_id = tc.category_id inner join t_user tu on a.user_id = tu.user_id where a.user_id = #{userId} and bill_time BETWEEN #{startTime,javaType=date} and #{endTime,javaType=date} order by bill_time desc
select bill_time, sum(bill_price) as bill_price from t_bill where user_id = #{userId} and bill_time between #{time} and #{nextTime} GROUP BY date_format(bill_time, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY bill_time desc

select bill_id, bill_time, bill_price, bill_remark, a.user_id as user_id, a.category_id as category_id, category_type, category_name, user_gender, user_name, user_password, user_real_name from t_bill a inner join t_category tc on a.category_id = tc.category_id inner join t_user tu on a.user_id = tu.user_id where a.user_id = #{userId} and a.bill_id = #{billId}
